title: [River's Rest Hall, Landing]
description: Three portholes look out over the orchard and send trickles of moonlight down the staircase.  A framed display of knots hangs on the wall next to an old brass lantern.  The floorboards are buckled and warped, though braided throw rugs cover the worst patches.

Three portholes look out over the orchard and flood the staircase with sunlight.  A framed display of knots hangs on the wall next to an old brass lantern.  The floorboards are buckled and warped, though braided throw rugs cover the worst patches.
